column4: my pc isn't boot so I have to recovery my data on it..so how can I do it using ubuntu a live cd
just boot with CD ~ mount the drive you need and backitup
yeah that's the point, I don't know how to do it ..I have the terminal open but I don't know the commands that I have to type...
open the gnome file browser shall have your HD shown there ~
yes you can. try System -> Admin.. -> Disk Util..
did you try mounting it with Disk Util. yet?
that's it the point I don't know how to do it ...
I know that I have to type sudo -i and the next steps I don't know ...
just select then drive and  partition -> click Mount  button
you may wanna click the Check filesystem button ~ if there is errors in filesystem that prevent you from mounting
you are doing the cli way ~
